body.name: Clek Foonf Convertible Car Seat, Mammoth (Flame Retardant Free Merino Wool + Tencel Blend)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 4 hrs 3 mins
features: Revolutionary forward-facing performance: inspired by automotive safety technology, each Foonf uses aluminum honeycomb Crumple Technology to absorb energy in a collision and reduce the forces transmitted to the child.

Built like a tank: built to look and feel like real vehicle seats. Each seat is built on a solid metal substructure with inner and outer energy-absorbing foam layers and an adjustable headrest for maximum side impact protection.
Effortless forward-facing installation: The Rigid-LATCH system makes proper forward-facing installation effortless, allowing you to remove and install your seat in seconds and with peace of mind.

Rear facing FOR LONGER: designed to international best practices for extended rear-facing use up to 50 pounds, and comes standard with a steel anti-rebound for enhanced rear-facing safety performance performance
Flame retardant free: tailored in Merino wool + TENCEL Blend to help naturally regulate the child's body temperature keeping them cool in the hot summer.
body.description: Clek Foonf is the mother of all car seats. Its patented REACT (Rigid-LATCH Energy Absorbing Crumple Technology) safety system revolutionizes forward-facing safety by significantly reducing the forces transmitted to the child in a collision, and delivering 'rear-facing like' Safety performance. Foonf offers an industry-leading extended rear-facing use up to 50 lb., complete with a steel anti-rebound bar for enhanced safety performance. And, its tank-like construction features a complete metal substructure, dual layers of energy absorbing foam and adjustable structural headrest for advanced side Impact protection. Innovative convenience features like rigid-LATCH makes proper forward-facing installation effortless. At less than 17 in, it makes 3-across installation possible in most vehicles. Made in North America.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Usage Guidelines Rear-Facing Mode: 25-43 in, 14-50 lbs, child able to sit upright alone Forward-Facing Mode: 30-49 in, 22-65 lbs, 2+ years recommended (1 year minimum) Can be used from birth with infant-thingy insert (sold separately) Included in box: Foonf, Anti-Rebound bar, Manual Accessories available for purchase separately Drink-thingy, Infant-thingy infant insert, Weelee travel bag, Cleaning Kit, Mat-thingy Clek Foonf Convertible Car Seat, with Rigid-LATCH, Extended Rear-Facing Design, Anti-Rebound Bar, REACT Crumple Technology and 9-Year Expiration The mother of all car seats Built like a tank. Made with patented energy-absorbing crumple technology. The Foonf convertible car seat provides the utmost protection for your child. It’s easy to install, with a forward-facing rigid-LATCH installation that’s so secure, you’d swear the seat becomes one with your vehicle. Free of Halogenated Flame Retardants, Because We're Parents Too. Like all Clek Car Seats, all Foonf models are free of brominated and chlorinated flame retardants, while Mammoth and Railroad models are free of any added flame retardants. Foonf is proudly designed, engineered, and made in Canada.

The Clek Foonf Convertible Car Seat is Built Like a Tank, Offering Advanced Safety Features and a Design That Suits Your Style. Extended Rear-Facing Designed to international best practices for extended rear-facing, which is to accommodate children in a rear-facing seating position until their 4th birthday. REACT Safety System The Foonf's REACT (Rigid-LATCH Energy Absorbing Crumple Technology) Safety System actively reduces the forces transferred to a child in a frontal collision using the principles of automotive crumple technology. Effortless Forward-Facing Install Safety starts with a solid, secure installation. Foonf’s Rigid-LATCH system is easy to use, which makes proper Forward-Facing installation effortless. Smooth Recline Foonf includes an easy-to-engage, smooth recline function with three recline options, making each ride more comfortable.

Advanced Side-Impact Protection Foonf protects your child in a side-impact collision with its adjustable structural headrest with deep side wings, energy absorbing foam layers, and complete metal substructure. Steel Anti-Rebound Bar Included for enhanced safety performance in rear-facing mode, Foonf’s Anti-Rebound bar improves stability by limiting rotation of the child seat, helping protect your child’s head from impact in the case of a collision. It also provides for a snug installation, nesting into the flat portion of the vehicle seat. This means more legroom for your child. Designed for 3-Across - Get the Most Out of Your Back Seat At less than 17 in wide, Foonf provides space that makes 3-across seating possible. Fabric Options for Every Family Foonf features fabric options that suit your child's personality and match their style (or your car!). Our C-Zero Plus Performance fabrics are GREENGUARD Gold Certified and provide resistance to water-based stains using an innovative fluorine-free formula that’s free of halogenated flame retardants. Mammoth (featuring a blend of Merino wool + TENCEL) and Railroad are flame-retardant free, OEKO-TEX Standard 100 certified, and free of PFAS, PFOA, PFC and PFOS chemicals.

Clek car seats are proudly manufactured in Ontario, Canada. Clek is a Canadian based manufacturer of child passenger safety seats that combine safety with ease-of-use and modern style. Born out of a global automotive supplier, Clek offers the superior design, engineering best practices, world-class manufacturing, and craftsmanship found in luxury automotive seating today. We Make Car Seats for Parents Like Us Ride safe. Ride ride. Ride on. Safety: it’s the reason we’re doing this in the first place – to protect the wellbeing of our children and yours. From thoughtful design to impact-reducing materials, all of our baby and toddler car seats and booster car seats are equipped with innovative safety features. Our car seats aren’t just functional. They’re designed to make a statement, because you shouldn’t have to sacrifice style for safety. Made in Canada 9-year expiration Free of Halogenated Flame Retardants Certified for use on an aircraft (FAA certified) Recyclable through Clek's Car Seat Recycling Program Package Dimensions: 31 x 18 17 in, 48 lbs Product Dimensions + Weight: 28 x 17.5 x 16 in, 33 lbs

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Benz of car seats!
reviews.reviewText: Only non toxic flame safe car seat I have found. Quality is top notch. Son no longer is crying. 10/10 easy installation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for kids who run hot!
reviews.reviewText: We’ve gone through 4 seats in under a year and this was by far the best. Long last rear facing seat that and comfortable on hot days. I’m a small human lol and was able to install this with ease! My tall very picky toddler approved (FINALLY) now I need two more but worth every penny.I wish it came with a sensor safe clip or the ability to add it on, that is a huge plus for when the grandparents are driving the kiddo around.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Need a lot of space for this bulky sucker. Pain to install and straps and buckles are cumbersome. Would of returned but my wife’s friend has one so apparently I’m stuck with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best safety features
reviews.reviewText: One of the safest seats around, worth every penny even though it's heavy and big. Not for everyone but I loved the install and found it easy
